article_title: Insurance company will refund Montanans $1.7 million for price discrimination
article_text:

article_metadata.author: Associated Press

og.description: HELENA — A health insurance company will refund roughly $1.7 million to Montana customers who have been forced to pay what the state calls unfairly high prices.
